item.title: Congruence properties of prime sums and Bernoulli polynomials
item.description: arXiv:2502.04731v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this article, we derive a congruence property of particular sum rules involving prime numbers. The resulting expression involves Bernoulli numbers and polynomials, for which we obtain, as a consequence, a general congruence relation as well.
